<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## includes() function

Checks if the specified value is equal.

There is another alias function called `contains`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function includes<T extends readonly []>(value: unknown, iterable: T): false;
```



## Example


```ts
includes('c', 'abcd'); // true
includes('e', 'abcd'); // false
includes(3, [1,2,3,4]); // true
includes(5, [1,2,3,4]); // false
```


[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/includes.ts)
